messages.subject: Groups
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/25/2002 12:42:19 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I don t play well with others either. Two people who had promised to do funshops at the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/25/2002 12:42:19 PM Eastern Standard Time,
jnjstau@... writes:
> It drives me insane for people to say
> "I'll do that" and then not do it and end up inconveniencing everyone. It
> aggravates me with kids and drives me insane with adults. Perhaps a
> control
> issue?
>
> Julie--who doesn't work well in groups

I don't play well with others either. Two people who had promised to do
funshops at the conference just didn't show---no message, no nothing. Just
didn't show (and they were at the same time to boot, so I was really
short-handed). Another reason to just do it myself.

~Kelly



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
